localization

Most of the Conzept interface can be localized, these parts include main UI elements such as menu labels and the topic-card section names.

The list of supported locales can be found in the Conzept settings file (“CONZEPT_LOCALES”). Conzept also has basic support for right-to-left scripts such as Arabic.

If you want to add a new locale to Conzept, you first to add it to the settings file and then add a new locale file in the “app/explore2/assets/i18n” directory.

The easiest way to do this is to copy the English locale to your new locale file and then make the translation changes for that locale.

Finally run “npm run build” to update the locale settings in the code base.
